      • queryHWNodeCPUAll

        public static java.lang.String queryHWNodeCPUAll(java.lang.String baseURL,
                                 java.lang.String application,
                                 java.lang.String tier,
                                 java.lang.String node,
                                 long start,
                                 long end,
                                 boolean rollup)

        This query will return the all CPU metrics from the Tier perspective for example: Application Infrastructure Performance|[TIER]|Hardware Resources|CPU|*

        This query will return the all CPU metrics from a Node perspective for example: Application Infrastructure Performance|[TIER]|Individual Nodes|[NODE]|Hardware Resources|CPU|*

        Parameters:
        baseURL - Base URL for the controller
        application - Name of the application
        tier - Name of the tier
        node - Name of the node
        start - Start time for the metric query
        end - End time for the metric query
        rollup - Whether to rollup the values
        Returns:
        String
